objects.text: Sterling Silver | Certificate of Authenticity | 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner features a luxurious rose-pink radial gradient background overlaid with soft geometric and circular design elements, lending a refined, feminine aesthetic. Centrally positioned is a product image ("product_image") showcasing a pair of rose gold stud earrings. The primary heading ("heading") sits at the top in a classic serif font in a rich garnet red, followed by a refined subheading ("subheading") in a soft mauve serif typeface, enhancing the high-end appeal. Informational text ("description") is elegantly centered below the product. The price ("price") is edged in bold beneath that, followed by a bold call-to-action against a deep rose button ("cta_background" and "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Background: #FFF0F0 → #FFCBD1  
- Deep Rose Red: #9E4244  
- Soft Mauve: #BD6E71  
- Dark Mulberry: #774042  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a playful and feminine color palette that includes a soft rose gold base, accented with blush pink and sparkling white crystals. The rose gold (#EFA9A9) frames the earrings, giving them a warm, luxurious feel. Blush pink (#F9C8D0) is used in the petal detailing, adding a delicate touch. The white crystals (#FFFFFF) and clear diamond-like elements (#E3E3E3) bring brilliance and texture, enhancing the visual contrast. These colors blend seamlessly with subtle transitions, while strategic highlights make the gems pop. A matching ad banner should use this palette to evoke elegance, charm, and femininity.
